templates.title: Testpages
templates.description: adds testpages for internal-only and external-only to test your settings
templates.note: traefik and overlay must be deployed first

templates.title: Paperless
templates.note: traefik and overlay must be deployed first, needs redis container deployed, needs db container and a paperless user+password+db

env.name: paperless_media_folder
env.label: Media Folder
env.description: Where paperless puts its media. Folder must be ready!

env.name: paperless_export_folder
env.label: Export Folder
env.description: Where paperless exports data. Folder must be ready!

env.name: paperless_import_folder
env.label: Import Folder
env.description: Where paperless imports data from. Folder must be ready!

templates.title: 3. Authelia
templates.description: Adds the authelia middleware with sso
templates.note:
Traefik and overlay must be deployed first. 
        Following Secrets must be defined  
       - DOMAIN_NAME 
       - ADMIN_MAIL 
       - AUTHELIA_JWT_SECRET- should be super safe! 
       - AUTHELIA_SESSION_SECRET - should be super safe! 
       - AUTHELIA_STORAGE_POSTGRES_PASSWORD 
       - AUTHELIA_NOTIFIER_SMTP_PASSWORD - get from mail provider! 
       - AUTHELIA_STORAGE_ENCRYPTION_KEY 
       - AUTHELIA_OIDC_HMAC 
       - AUTHELIA_OIDC_JWKS_KEY 
       - AUTHELIA_OIDC_IMMICH_HASH 
       - AUTHELIA_OIDC_HOMARR_HASH 
       - AUTHELIA_OIDC_JELLYFIN_HASH 
       - AUTHELIA_OIDC_PAPERLESS_HASH 
       - AUTHELIA_OIDC_PORTAINER_HASH 
       - AUTHELIA_OIDC_SEAFILE_HASH 
        The following configs must be defined 
       - authelia_config from https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bunhome/swarmConfig/master/authelia/configuration.yml 
       - authelia_user - This is the user database as in the documentation

templates.name: 2. Traefik
templates.description: Adds traefik reverse proxy with dns challenge from cloudflare and authelia middleware
templates.note: Overlay network and secret CF_DNS_API_TOKEN must be deployed first!

env.name: ACME_MAIL
env.label: Mail that should be used for ACME

templates.name: 1. Overlay
templates.description: Adds an Overlay Network that all services that should be reachable through Traefik can connect to.
